mandatory: * Fields marked with asterisk are mandatory.

homepage.question: Delayed? Cancelled? Get the compensation you deserve!
homepage.claim-info: You can claim up to €600 for delays, cancellations, or overbookings under EU and UK regulations.

simple.title: It’s Simple
simple.get-paid: You get paid - we handle the airline!

rights.title: Your Rights Under EU Law (EC 261/2004)
rights.text: Regulation (EC) No. 261/2004 is an EU law that protects air passengers. It requires airlines to offer compensation (up to €600) and assistance when flights are cancelled, delayed over 3 hours, or boarding is denied.
rights.goal: The goal: ensure passengers are fairly treated when their travel plans are disrupted.

when.title: When Does EC 261/2004 Apply?
when.point1: Flights departing from an EU airport.
when.point2: Flights arriving at an EU airport with an EU airline.
when.note: Note: Compensation is not applicable for extraordinary circumstances like severe weather or security issues.

compensation.title: Compensation Amounts
compensation.condition: If the airline is responsible for the disruption:

case-form.compensation-start: Congratulations! You could earn up to €
case-form.sign-in-to-see-cases: Sign in to view your cases.

disruption-form.cancellationQuestion: How many days before cancellation has the airline informed you?*
disruption-form.delayQuestion: How late did you arrive to the destination?*
disruption-form.denialBoardingQuestion: Did you give up your seat voluntarily?*

airlineMotive.disruptingQuestion: Did the airline mention disruption motive?*
airlineMotive.airlineMotiveQuestion: What was the motive communicated by the airline?*

disruption-form.emptyDescription: The description should not be empty.
disruption-form.maxLengthDescription: The description should have less than 1000 characters.

auth-service.registration-success: Registration successful. Please check your email.

sign-in.password-minlength: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
sign-in.password-invalid: Password must contain letters, numbers, and special characters.

request-reset.title: Reset Password
request-reset.description: Enter your email address to receive a new temporary password. The first time you log in, you will be prompted to change your password.
request-reset.email-invalid: Please enter a valid email address.
request-reset.email-sent: You will receive an email in a few minutes with your temporary password.

change-pass.title: Change Your Password
change-pass.password-minlength: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
change-pass.password-invalid: Password must contain letters, numbers, and special characters.
change-pass.password-length: At least 6 characters and at most 30 characters.
change-pass.password-invalid-reset: Password must contain letters, numbers, or special characters.

user-details.title: Personal Information
user-details.subtitle: Please fill in your details.
user-details.password-email: If you do not have an account, you will receive an email with your temporary password after registering.
user-details.firstname-invalid: First name can only contain letters.
user-details.lastname-invalid: Last name can only contain letters.
user-details.address-invalid: Address can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, commas, periods, and hyphens.
user-details.completing-for-someone-else: Are you completing this form for someone else?
user-details.someone-else-underage-label: Is the beneficiary under 18 years old?
user-details.accept-terms: I have read and agree to the

confirmation.congratulations: Congratulations! You can now submit your case. But first, here is a preview of your next steps:

step1.title: Step 1
step1.text: You can enter your account by clicking the Finish button below. After entering your account, upload all necessary documents for your case.

step2.title: Step 2
step2.text: When you click Finish a contract with your details will be generated. Read it, sign it and upload it to your case.

step3.title: Step 3
step3.text: Wait for an employee to process your case and check your email for possible updates.

mainForm.reservationLength: Reservation number must be exactly 6 characters.
mainForm.departingAirportLength: Departing Airport must be exactly 3 characters
mainForm.departingAirportUpper: Airport code must be 3 uppercase letters.
mainForm.destinationAirportLength: Destination Airport must be exactly 3 characters
mainForm.destinationAirportUpper: Airport code must be 3 uppercase letters.
mainForm.connectionDestinationLength: Airport code must be exactly 3 characters.
mainForm.connectionDestinationUpper: Airport code must be 3 uppercase letters.
mainForm.destinationIsDeparting: The departing airport cannot be the same as the destination airport.
mainForm.usedDepartingAirport: Don't use the departing airport as connection.
mainForm.usedDestinationAirport: Don't use the destination airport as connection.
mainForm.dateOrder: Flight times must be in chronological order
mainForm.selectConnection: Please select a connection flight to provide details
mainForm.invalidFlightTimes: Flight times must be valid (arrival after departure)
mainForm.fillInAllConnections: Do not leave connection airports empty.

flightForm.flightNumberMinLength: Flight Number must be at least 3 characters.
flightForm.flightNumberMaxLength: Flight Number must be at most 6 characters.
flightForm.airlineMinLength: Airline name must be at least 3 characters.
flightForm.airlineMaxLength: Airline name must be at most 50 characters.
flightForm.airlineNotEmptyAfterTrim: Airline name must not be empty.
flightForm.arrivalBeforeDeparture: Arrival time must be after departure time.

eligibilityForm.loading: Please wait while we verify the eligibility of your case.

eligible.compensation-start: You may be entitled to compensation of up to €
eligible.compensation-end: . Click Next to provide your personal details and submit your claim.

notEligible.sorry: We are sorry! Unfortunately, you are not eligible for compensation:
notEligible.notEligibleMessage: According to European Regulation EC261/2004, if your flight was delayed or canceled due to an air traffic control (ATC) strike, adverse weather conditions, or other circumstances beyond the airline’s control, the airline is not obliged to compensate you.

conditionsNotFulfilled.sorry: We are sorry! You do not meet the eligibility requirements:
conditionsNotFulfilled.notEligibleMessage:
According to European Regulation EC261/2004, the airline is not obliged to compensate you if your flight:
had a delay of less than 3 hours, or
if you were notified about the cancellation more than 14 days before the flight date (email, SMS)
the airline is also not obliged to compensate you in case of cancellations announced less than 14 days before the flight date if you arrive with less than 3 hours of delay compared to the original itinerary on an alternative flight offered by the airline.
We are sorry and thank you for your understanding. To check another flight, click here.
